title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
Lee: Hey Aigburth.
Aig: Sup.
Lee: It seems like you're really working hard lately. Good job.
Aig: Yeah! Thanks!
Lee: But just a reminder, you shouldn't be neglecting the other parts of your training. 
Lee: The company still wants us to be well-rounded, to an extent.
->Ugh, really?
    Aig: Ugh, really?
->Sure thing.
    Aig: Yeah, sure thing.
Lee: Yeah, it's kind of a pain. 
Lee: You know that I'm no good at promoting myself, but I still gotta try.
Lee: Same goes for you--even if you don't think you're good at something, you should at least work on it a little.
Lee: They're not gonna take it easy on you just because you're the youngest, you know?
Aig: Yeah, yeah.
